results.description: Seonaid McIntosh hopes the exclusion of shooting from the 2022 Commonwealth Games will end being "a good thing" for the sport in Scotland.
results.shortTitle: 'Games exclusion could help shooting'
results.title: Shooting: Commonwealth Games exclusion could be 'good' for Scotland, says Seonaid McIntosh

results.description: Briton Matt Skelhon wins his second gold of the World Shooting Para Sport Championships in Sydney.
results.shortTitle: Skelhon wins second world shooting gold
results.title: World Shooting Para Sport Championships: Britain's Skelhon wins double gold

results.description: Matt Skelhon wins the 10m air rifle prone mixed SH1 title for Britain at the World Shooting Para Sport Championships in Sydney.
results.shortTitle: Skelhon seals shooting gold for Britain
results.title: Matt Skelhon seals 10m air rifle prone mixed SH1 gold for Britain

results.description: Seonaid McIntosh is "absolutely targeting the podium" at the Tokyo Olympics following an incredible year for the Scottish shooter.
results.shortTitle: McIntosh sets sights on Olympic medal
results.title: Seonaid McIntosh sets sights on Olympic medal after 'crazy' year of success

results.description: Scotland's Seonaid McIntosh equals a world record as she wins rifle gold at the European Shooting Championships.
results.shortTitle: McIntosh wins shooting gold at Euros
results.title: Seonaid McIntosh wins gold at European Shooting Championships

results.description: Two British shooting pairs win bronze at their respective European championships.
results.shortTitle: GB win double bronze at shooting Euros

results.description: McKenna Dahl's parents were told that she would never walk, talk or read - but she is aiming for Paralympic gold in 2020.
results.shortTitle: 'I was the only woman in my final in Rio'
results.title: McKenna Dahl on how she 'fell in love with shooting at summer camp'

results.description: Aaron Heading will represent Great Britain in trap shooting after winning silver at the European Championships in Italy.
results.shortTitle: Heading qualifies for Tokyo Olympics
results.title: Aaron Heading qualifies for Tokyo Olympics after European Championships silver

results.description: India's Sports Minister Kiren Rijiju asks the British government to intervene over the removal of shooting from the 2022 Commonwealth Games in Birmingham.
results.shortTitle: India asks for help over Games shooting
results.title: Commonwealth Games 2022: India asks British government to intervene over shooting exclusion

results.description: Britain's Seonaid McIntosh claims her second medal of the International Shooting Sport Federation World Cup in Rio with gold in the Three Positions Rifle event.
results.shortTitle: GB's McIntosh wins World Cup gold
results.title: Shooting: GB's Seonaid McIntosh wins second World Cup medal

results.description: Scotland's Seonaid McIntosh wins silver in the 10m women's air rifle at the International Shooting Sport Federation World Cup in Rio.
results.shortTitle: McIntosh wins World Cup silver
results.title: Seonaid McIntosh wins air rifle silver at ISSF World Cup

results.description: Proposals to stage a shooting championships alongside the 2022 Birmingham Commonwealth Games would break rules, say organisers.
results.shortTitle: Commonwealth shooting event 'not allowed'
results.title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Proposed shooting event cannot take place in the UK alongside Games

results.description: The organisers of the 2022 Commonwealth Games defend their decision to exclude shooting from the programme in Birmingham.
results.shortTitle: Birmingham 2022 defends shooting exclusion
results.title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Shooting exclusion defended by organisers

results.description: Matt Skelhon wins double silver as Great Britain seal seven medals at the World Shooting Para Sport World Cup in Osijek, Croatia.
results.shortTitle: Skelhon wins double World Cup silver
results.title: World Shooting Para Sport World Cup: Matt Skelhon wins double silver in Croatia

results.description: The Isle of Man collect another eight medals in swimming, shooting, tennis and athletics on day two of the Island Games.

results.description: Britain's Matt Coward-Holley wins gold in Olympic trap shooting at the ISSF World Championships as well as bronze in the team event alongside Nathan Hales and Aaron Heading.

results.description: Alice Schlesinger wins judo silver for Great Britain at the European Games in Minsk, while Naomi Folkard and Patrick Huston secure silver in archery.

results.description: The 2021 Commonwealth Youth Games - which were originally awarded to Northern Ireland - will now be hosted by Trinidad and Tobago.

results.description: Double Commonwealth champion David Phelps disappointed shooting is to be dropped from the 2022 Birmingham Games.
